code: import React from'react';import'./Scrollup.css';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Scrollup=()=>{window.addEventListener("scroll",function(){const scrollup=document.querySelector(".scrollup");if(this.scrollY>=560)scrollup.classList.add("show-scroll");else scrollup.classList.remove("show-scroll");});return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("a",{href:"",className:"scrollup",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{className:"bx bxs-up-arrow-circle scrollup__icon"})});};export default Scrollup;
